effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder's Toughness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the holder's Toughness while in a contest.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせて　コンテストに　参加すると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
たくましく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
During a Contest, it raises the Tough
aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Aumenta la “Grinta” di chi l’indossa in una Gara.

Restaura gradualmente los PS de los Pokémon
de tipo Veneno y daña a todos los demás.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Trainer erhöhen damit in
Wettbewerben die „Stärke“ ihres Pokémon.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Robustesse
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

지니게 하여 콘테스트에 참가하면
그 포켓몬은 여느 때보다
강인하게 보인다.

もたせて　コンテストに　さんかすると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
たくましく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Tough aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Tough aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Robustesse
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Tough” aspect of the
holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Tough” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Tough” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
TOUGH condition in CONTESTS.

A hold item that
raises TOUGH in
